Directions: Read the selection and choose the best answer to each question.
Title: A Walk Through My Rain Forest
Author: by Isaac Olaleye
Content: A walk through my rain forest is haunting.
Its greatness makes me feel very small.
Is more than can be described.
I walk into a hidden, green paradise —
And the forlorn cooing of turtledoves.
The rain forest is the home
The rain forest is my home,
A palace of fragrance and tastes
Copyright: “A Walk Through My Rain Forest,” © Isaac Olaleye
